date.description: The date for the data entry.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the video on this playback location was streamed live or on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewer was subscribed to the channel when watching the video on this playback location.

country_code.description: The country code of the playback location.

playback_location_type.description: The type of the playback location.

playback_location_detail.description: Additional details about the playback location.

views.description: The total number of views on this playback location.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes on this playback location.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average number of seconds watched by viewers before stopping or skipping a video on this playback location.

average_view_duration_percentage.description: The average percentage of a video watched by viewers on this playback location.

red_views.description: The number of views coming from YouTube Red subscribers on this playback location.

red_watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes from YouTube Red subscribers on this playback location.
